thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: EU watchdogs warn consumers of cryptocurrency "pricing bubble"

title: EU watchdogs warn consumers of cryptocurrency "pricing bubble"
text:
February 12, 2018 / 1:11 PM / in 43 minutes EU watchdogs warn consumers of cryptocurrency "pricing bubble" Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
LONDON, Feb 12 (Reuters) - Virtual currencies such as bitcoin have shown clear signs of a pricing bubble and consumers could lose all their money, the European Unionâ€™s banking, securities and insurance watchdogs said on Monday. 
Cryptocurrencies are highly risky and unregulated products that are unsuitable as investment, savings or retirement planning products, the regulators said in a joint statement. Reporting by Huw Jones; Editing by David Goodman
